originalText.text: The LGBTTQA community needs more attention please, now our center is located on the first floor 1D2-B before it was on 3B, it is useless to build new facilities if there is not a good staff, the surgeon and the staff are always stressed and therefore give very bad service, delays in appointments of hours, every Every time I come here I have to wait at least an hour to be treated by this stressed doctor, please we need more personal , trained and professionals surgeons, please  üôèüèº.

originalText.text:
I arrived at the ER with high blood pressure. Staff treated me with kindness, dignity, and respect. The doctor that managed  my care was very professional as well as the rest of the staff. I felt I was in good hands. Nice to know since I live 3 block from the hospital.

Thank You :)

originalText.text: I came to New York to visit and got extremely sick . I came to this hospital because I am pregnant and have been hurting for Three days and I can‚Äôt hold down any food I‚Äôm exhausted and dehydrated. The front clerk was so busy talking about ppl that I stood at the window for ten minutes before anybody even acknowledged me . Again I‚Äôm pregnant and have  been hurting for over three days I was going to wait til I got back home to Texas but the pain was too much to bear . The two men at the front are rude as hell . They are not helping nobody all they do is talk about people and gossiping in the back with other nurses and emts. They don‚Äôt care at this hospital if you care about your health or yo child‚Äôs safety or wellbeing and health . DO NOT COME TO THIS HOSPITAL! They will laugh in your face .

originalText.text:
My son was born at this hospital, he turned 1 last week.
I don't know why it's taken me over a year to post this but better late than never =)
My family and I are VERY pleased with the staff and our experience while being treated here. Looking back at those very challenging times, I am SO grateful for all the nurses and doctors who took care of us, and helped us deliver our baby boy safely.
THANK YOU again!!!

originalText.text: I am so so happy I chose Metropolitan for the birth and aftercare of my newborn baby! Immaculate halls and rooms, gracious, professional and attentive staff that seriously care about you, world-class doctors and healthcare; I can just go on and on. Thank you!
